name: Bamboo Yoga Pants XS-XL
description:
Marvelously comfortable pants in the softest of Bamboo French Terry. One could live in these for days. Best worn for yoga, general athletic activities, errands, leisure and sleep. You will look forward to these at the end of every day. Available in navy blue (XS, SM, Med, L, XL).

Wide leg yoga pant with fold down waist band. Unfinished hem, side seams reinforced. Fabric does not ravel. Will shrink up to an inch with washing and drying, I will add length to compensate for shrinkage. All pants will be made to a 32" inseam unless requested otherwise -please send me a message at the time of purchase.

Fabric content:

66% Rayon from Bamboo, 28% Cotton, 6% Spandex

Available sizes and colours can be viewed in the drop down size box. Please specify desired inseam (if other than 32") in a note to seller at time of purchase. 

Sizing Information:
**Please compare your own measurements to the ones bellow (see 'Measuring Tips' in my Policies section). If you fall between sizes, take the smaller size. If you are unsure or would like a second opinion on sizes or fit please feel free to contact me.**

Extra Small:
Abdomen (just below belly button) 31"/79cm
Hip36.5/93cm
Hip Depth 6.25"/16cm

Small:
Abdomen (just below belly button) 33"/84cm
Hip 38.5/98cm
Hip Depth 6.5"/16.5cm

Medium:
Abdomen (just below belly button) 35"/89cm
Hip 40.5/103cm
Hip Depth 6.75"/17.5cm

Large:
Abdomen (just below belly button) 37"/94cm
Hip 42.5/108cm
Hip Depth 7"/18cm

Extra Large:
Abdomen (just below belly button) 39"/99cm
Hip 44.5"
Hip Depth 7.25"/18.5cm

name: Pleated Jeans
description:
Pleated jeans in 10.5 oz., dark denim. Available in sizes small, medium, large. Three button closure side-front. Back welt pocket.

Sizing Information:

Please keep in mind that these are measurements taken from the actual garment and you'll need to factor in room to breathe and move. Measure your most comfortable clothes, note how they fit, the fabric composition, and where they sit on your body for comparison. Please contact me if you have any questions.

-Large-
Top of Waist band: 35"
Bottom of waist band (3.25" down): 39.5"
Crotch rise: 27" -sit low on hips and are meant to have a bit of a dropped crotch.
Hips are fairly free with all the pleats -will fit hips that measure under 42" -more important to have a snug waistband.

-Medium-
Top of waistband: 33.5"
Bottom of waistband (3" down): 38"
Will fit hips smaller than body measurement 40"

-Small-
top of waistband: 32.5
Bottom of waistband(3" down): 37"
Crotch rise 26"
Will fit hips smaller than body measurement 39"

name: Vintage Inspired Plaid Dress, Sizes Small, medium, large
description:
Vintage inspired, plaid dress. 100% cotton seersucker. Front pockets. Back zipper. Great for picnics, a day at the beach or or going to market.

Available in blue or brown plaid.

Available in sizes small, medium or large.

Small:
Bust 34"/ 87cm
Waist 27"/ 69cm

Medium: 
Bust 36"/ 92cm
Waist 29"/ 74cm

Large: 
Bust 38"/ 97cm
Waist 31"/ 79cm

name: High Waist Skinny Jeans in Black or Indigo Stretch Denim, Sizes 2-14(US)
description:
High Waist Skinny Jeans in 8 oz. stretch denim, indigo or black. Made-to-order in sizes 2-14(US). 5 Pockets jeans, Zipper fly, 5 buttons, single needle construction, hand sewn button holes. Can be hemmed to your desired length. Please note that apart from hemming, these jeans are not custom tailored. I am however available for a fitting consultation should you be unsure as to your size.

Who will these jeans fit? Bodies with a 10" to 11" difference between their true waist and hip measurements. True waist is measured at base of rib cage, hip measurement is taken horizontally across the hip crease (where legs meet torso) and around base of bum. If your torso were to be shaped like a pear, measure at the bottom of the pear. If these jeans are to fit, this tape placement should yield your largest measurement. More suited for women with wider, broad hips than larger backsides.

The fit is for a 'misses' size range.
